title: Venetica.Repack-R.G.Mechanics

Genre: RPG / 3D / 3rd Person
Developer: Deck13 Interactive
Publisher: dtp entertainment
Publication Type: RePack
Game Language: Eng | Rus
Voice Language: Eng | Rus
Crack: TRIVIUM

Description:

"That death is like a dream, will bring joy to" William Shakespeare. Hamlet. 

Venice. XVI century. Pretty girl named Scarlett of quiet and cozy village 
lives his happy life and no idea what tests will soon fall on her fragile 
shoulders. After her dad by profession, not a mechanic and carpenter, 
and not even climber, and the most that neither is a true death.
Contrary to popular perceptions to take such a "vacant" position can 
any mortal. Not on their own, of course: there is a special Council, 
which periodically starts carefully sort through candidates studying 
their biography, achievements, poring over resumes and eventually 
make the appointment. Each appointed, that was not too hard, is 
endowed with a number of unique abilities.
However, by the time the father Scarlett took office, the former 
Victoria's death with the help of black magic could achieve immortality 
and refused to give the post to someone else, and so as not to dispute 
arises, a new candidate for the Board he had kidnapped. Here is where 
our story begins, full of battles, puzzles and exciting adventures ...
You will explore Venice, open world of beautiful Italian cities. Nothing 
prevents you buy gondola and swim the famous canals. Engage in 
dialogue with random passers-by, sidequests, quarrel, make friends, 
fall in love and hatred. Solve clever puzzles - or resort to brute force. 
Sometimes have to work not only his head, but with a sledgehammer.
Particular attention should be paid to the combat system of the game. 
Simple zaklikivanie enemy - is the last century. It is necessary to 
select a variety of enemies your approach to use different combos 
(the set of which will depend on your performance and the weapons used) 
and regularly change the tactics of their actions, as the enemies in the 
game scrutinize your fighting techniques and adjust to them. And do not 
forget about the magic! After all, you're not just anybody, 
but the daughter of Death!

Features:

Colorful graphics
Charming protagonist
The unique setting and trivial plot
A large variety of weapons and magic
Dynamic gameplay, combining quality action games and classic RPG
Huge open world
Two of the world (the world of the living and the world of the dead) 
to move between which you can in an instant
Dynamic change of day and night, which affects the whole city life
Intuitive control system


Features repack

Venetica
Version of the game - v1.2
Do not cut / recoded
Ability to select a combination of text and voice
